title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.14 - Vandalism
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.14 - Vandalism

State Regulations

No person shall destroy, scratch, mark, deface, disturb or
remove any sign, marker, wall, building or other structure, tree, flower, shrub, lawn or any other property at a transportation
facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.14

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
